summary.span: 包含使用 和 基础结构执行架构导入所需的信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由并[ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)。The is used by the and the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md). 类控制是否对具有包装参数的 document-literal 样式的文档使用特殊大小写。The class controls whether special-casing is used for document-literal styled documents with wrapped parameters. 使用 **/ 包装**开关与[ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)工具来指定正常大小写。Use the **/wrapped** switch with the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md) tool to specify normal casing.
